h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Gore-Eye Daoist
content: There’s many more ways he can create more blood pools, and not all of them look the same. Sometimes he’ll dance about and ring his staff, shooting them out in all directions and ending with a shockwave of bloody force you need to dodge.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Sand_Formation_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Sand Formation Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Windseal Gate' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Gore-Eye Daoist'.
The content is as follows:
There’s many more ways he can create more blood pools, and not all of them look the same. Sometimes he’ll dance about and ring his staff, shooting them out in all directions and ending with a shockwave of bloody force you need to dodge.
